claim: Recombinant HA antigens produced using BEVS have been shown to induce significantly higher levels of broadly cross-reactive antibodies against highly conserved regions of HA compared with egg-derived vaccines.
explanation: A journal header page for the Elsevier journal Vaccine, showing the ScienceDirect contents list reference, the Vaccine title, and the journal homepage URL; no data or figures are present. The image contains only the journal’s title header and does not present any study data or findings related to recombinant HA antigens or antibody responses, and therefore does not support the claim. Note: The image is clear but contains no experimental or clinical data; limited to journal branding information.
